definition: cattle pen
ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
surname Niu
fence/railing/hurdle/column or box (of text or other data)

sentences.english: As I opened my neighbor's cattle pen to lead it out by its halter, a dog barked ferociously at me.
sentences.chinese: 我開了門，潛入鄰居的牛欄，牽着牛繩就出了門。

sentences.english: Inside the farmer's barn, a couple dozen cows stand listlessly in stalls.
sentences.chinese: 在農場的牛欄裏，十幾頭奶牛無精打采的站着。

sentences.english: Before long, the cowshed gate is opened three times.
sentences.chinese: 不一會兒，牛欄的門第三次打開了。

sentences.english: Soon after the hunters came to the stable, and asked if anyone had seen the hart.
sentences.chinese: 獵人們很快來到牛欄，詢問是否有人看到這頭鹿。

sentences.english: There are already plans for a cowshed in St Moritz and a bodega in northern Spain.
sentences.chinese: 已經有計劃在聖莫里茨牛欄和博德加在西班牙北部。

sentences.english: A heifer bellowed in her stall.
Lieutenant-Colonel Stephen Goldsmith has found they also make a good cattle corral.
sentences.chinese: 斯蒂芬史密斯中校他們也建了一個不錯的牛欄。

sentences.english: Holland at home, i can't find Nutrilon Pepti 2 on your website, when it can be available?
sentences.chinese: 你們網站上沒有牛欄全水解2段，何時能上貨？

sentences.english: Wilbur's new home was in the lower part of the barn, directly underneath the cows.
sentences.chinese: 威爾伯的新家在穀倉的底層，就在牛欄的正下面。
